Module com.hack23.cia.web
Package com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common.menufactory.impl

Class PartyRankingMenuItemFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common.menufactory.impl.AbstractMenuItemFactoryImpl
com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common.menufactory.impl.PartyRankingMenuItemFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PartyRankingMenuItemFactory
@Service public final class PartyRankingMenuItemFactoryImpl extends AbstractMenuItemFactoryImpl implements PartyRankingMenuItemFactory
The Class PartyRankingMenuItemFactoryImpl.

Responsible for creating and organizing party ranking menu items, charts, and overview pages. Enhances user navigation to analyze party influence, roles, and performance within EU, government, committees, and parliament. Leverages VaadinIcons to visually communicate context and concise descriptions focusing on political significance.

  • Method Details

    • createOverviewPage

      public void createOverviewPage(com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout panelContent)
      Creates the overview page with concise, politically focused descriptions. Each button link is accompanied by ~50 character descriptions highlighting political context rather than technical details.
      Specified by:
      createOverviewPage in interface PartyRankingMenuItemFactory
      Parameters:
      panelContent - the vertical layout to hold the overview content

    • createPartyRankingMenuBar

      public void createPartyRankingMenuBar(com.vaadin.ui.MenuBar menuBar)
      Creates the party ranking menu bar and integrates it into the main application menu. Ensures consistent icon usage and logical grouping of party ranking topics.
      Specified by:
      createPartyRankingMenuBar in interface PartyRankingMenuItemFactory
      Parameters:
      menuBar - the main menu bar to which the party ranking items will be added

    • createPartyRankingTopics

      public void createPartyRankingTopics(com.vaadin.ui.MenuBar.MenuItem partynMenuItem)
      Adds party ranking topics to the specified menu item. Uses icons that reflect the content context, such as charts for data visualization, groups or institutions for organizational structures, and history for past activity.
      Specified by:
      createPartyRankingTopics in interface PartyRankingMenuItemFactory
      Parameters:
      partynMenuItem - the parent menu item to which party ranking topics are added
